#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long int
using namespace std; 
string ch[10]={"","","2","3","223","5","53","7","7222","7332"};
 
int main()
{
    lli n,t;
	cin >> t;
	while ( t-- )
	{
		cin>>n;
		string str,ans;
		cin>>str;
		for(lli i=0;i<str.length();i++)
			ans+=ch[str[i]-'0'];
		sort(ans.begin(),ans.end());
		reverse(ans.begin(),ans.end());
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
    return 0;
}
